pipeline.description: Displays credit card information and other payment related information and lets the user change it.

text-node.description: Provides functionality to add a new credit card payment instrument to the saved payment instruments of the current customer.
Renders a list of the saved credit card payment instruments of the current customer.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Grab ExpirationYear Custom Objects from BM, sorted in ascending order by year

text-node.description: Deletes a saved credit card payment instrument.
